text: 7:3 Esekiel 9:4-6; Akar Mogomem 6:6; 9:4; 14:1; 22:4A kamaghɨn mɨgei, “Ia zuamɨra nguazim ko ongarim ko temebagh asɨghasɨghan markɨ. God uan ingangarir gumazamizibagh inaba. E faragh uan Godɨn ingangarir gumazamiziba, inabazir osizirim men guabar an osirigh gɨvaghtɨ, ia gɨn bizibagh asɨghasɨgh.”
